Never coming back...my meal should have been comped. Any other restaurant would have done the same.

Very good Restaurant to go to. Had a nice waiter, good food, good service, and a good night out. Everything was great except the wait. To get seated was 15 minutes. To get drinks and food was the same time. If the wait was shorter, I would rate it 5 stars. But other than that, the night was great.

I got there right when they opened and immediately had to wait for a hostess to seat me. When I turned around there was already a line out the door. It took 10 minutes to be seated.  I'm assuming they were short staffed. Once I'm seated. , I walk to restroom.  Well apparently the staff was not paying attention to the customers needs because I was asked by 2 women to take their plates. What nerve! I said I don't work here! The bathroom was dirty.  The food didn't take long.  I ordered the omg nachos and they were disgusting.  I may as well of gone to 711 for nachos and made my own guac and chili sauce.  The servers all looked unhappy . At least I know now not to bother going in there. Terrible food and service
Got here at 8:30pm and got seated at 9:25 so it's a 55 minutes waiting,  Order the food and arrived on the table by 10:16 so we waisted a whole night .. Not worth the time.
The wait time Friday night, 10 Minutes. The manager Ryan was superb, our waiter Adam was super. I would recommend Red Robin for great service & food. Thanks again Ryan you're the best.

This guy Adam at the bar............  Good luck. Food took forever not his fault. Asked for 5 stars on their survey kind of begging? Let's say the kitchen did a good job taking their time a cooking a good salad

When I walked in I thought I walked into a McDonalds. Totally had the McDonald's vibe going on. It was loud and there were kids running around. The place needed to be swept. The service was okay. We had to wait to call on our server because she kept passing us by. The food was good though.

Came out here tonight and asked about he beautiful seating outside that was available and was denied just because we had our five year old daughter. When I asked why they responded with everyone had to be over 21, Unbelievable!!!

I give this place 3 stars, because the service is good and the food is good, but the presentation is horrible, the facility has terrible acoustics, it is very loud and the price is on the high side for burgers and fries.
After a few attempts to try out this new location we decided to never go back. The service is just so terrible I can get a better burger at the Habit. Bye Felisha!

The only reason I would not give this place lower than one star is because there is no lower rating. My wife, kids and I were seated fairly quickly and sat for 20 minutes on a marginally busy Tuesday night (October 4th, just so the manager and staff can see this) with not a single waiter, waitress or manager even giving our table a glance. Seriously, I counted six wait staff, all walked by without noticing at the fact we had a pile of close menus on our table, a computer with a blinking low battery light and all of us trying to make eye contact with ANYONE. The hostess saw me, three times, but still no one stopped by. The busboy cleaned the table right next to us, and never even looked at us. Maybe if the manager, who was flitting around not more than two tables away, had bothered to look around at how his patrons were doing, maybe we would have been noticed. We ended up at Wood Ranch, which is more expensive, but A MUCH BETTER CHOICE OVERALL. Four stars, Wood Ranch at the Northridge Fashion Center.

This gourmet burger place was quite underwhelming.. We ordered the Buzz Mac n cheese burger and it looked nothing like the picture and tasted nothing like I thought it would. Unlike the picture , the burger had a very thin layer of rather cheeseless looking pasta in the middle of 2 patties topped with pepper jack cheese. I sampled some of the  Mac and cheese and it tasted more like pasta salad. Overall the burger just didn't taste good at all! Service was super slow. Waited over 15 minutes for a fry refill. Our waitress never came back to refill water or anything we pretty much had to wave her down. Then our bill was all jacked up.. I also wasn't fond of the pretentious rules. 21 and over only for the patio and bar area. Bar area I get, but patio not so much -  especially considering that all the seats were completely empty. Don't think I'll be back!

Oct 7th. The wait was Not worth waiting for to eat. After getting seated; server told us she right with us. But lack SAP with our grandkids; the food was way below standards. Their Signature Burger lack BBQ sauce & Chili Burger was like it set for a while under the heating lamp. Also; NO bottomless Fries-Happen/ the Cooking Oil tasted--WEEKS OLD..The children food was Not good looking to me. I feel the Oil in the Fryer needed changing for sure. Had a side salad; that lettuce was Not cris & fresh tasting.  I CAN'T see how they past the Health Dept.; as far "Time & Temperature Factors" I question... I worked & was a Certified Deli Deli Manager over 35yrs. In the food business. This location "TRUELY FAILED" on All points. This was our second time there...down hill it going. Next time it "Wood Ranch" for Sure Or the "Habit" or "The Stand" in Northridge; CA. By the manager offer free deserts to the kids; but that's Not what we wanted‼...just Good FRESH FOOD in a Timely Matter‼

Food was good but I wasn't really happy with the service,  he was nice but took to long to bring another order of the bottomless fries my daughter will not eat her cheeseburger without fries so it got cold while she waited for them, she had also asked for ranch dressing but finish her fries first so it came a lil too late and btw that electronic screen they have on the tables to call the server does not work! It kept blinking but nobody came until I called the hostess and asked her to call our waiter but the food is good so we are coming back for sure.

We have given this location a chance many times. Red robin does not have experienced staff and the customer service is non existent. The food is okay. Today I watched while the host and hostess continued to sit parties of threes and fours that arrived after our party of six. I used to waitress in college so I know how hard the job can be and I  learned you can push tables together to accomodate a party of six or more. I attempted to ask the hosts but they said you have a large party! We have to sit the smaller parties first. We walked out along with other so called large parties and all went over to wood ranch grill. We received excellent friendly service and delicious food at wood ranch. I highly  recommend  wood ranch restaurant at the northridge fashion center.

Don't get me wrong.  My partner and I enjoyed our meal.  But the service?  Horrible. The person who took our order said, "Hi.  My name is Brianna and I will be taking care of you today." Oh, she took care of us alright! It took her forever to have another person bring us our meal.   Then some other person comes by and says "How's your meal?  Great, right?"   Why do these idiots ask you how your meal is when your mouth is full?  Seriously? Then, we were halfway through our meal, I asked for more fries.  Did my partner get asked for my fruit?  Nope. Brianna was G-d knows where.  Then she sauntered by and asked if I wanted a refill on my Diet Coke.  "Nope," was my reply. Then my partner asked for the check and a box to take the rest of her lettuce wrap in. We should have known right then and there we would be waiting forever. That was NOT going to happen. I went over the manager who wasn't really busy himself and told him we needed to leave and we wanted our check and a box. Again, we had to wait another five minutes. You can imagine what my partner left for a tip.

One of the managers, kathy, was very helpful and fixed our order after it came out super late (They took more than 45 min)! after we ordered our food! It must have sat under a food lamp because it was dried out and cold!  The burgers were NASTY!   My son ordered a sunny side up egg to add on to his burger and it was ice cold!  If it weren't for Kathy, this would've been the WORST EXPERIENCE at a restaurant ever!!!  Our waiter was beyond terrible!!! We ordered nachos and 3 burgers but everything that came out (over 45 minutes later, was cold, dry and disgusting!) After we were seated we told him we were so hungry that we didnt care what order the food came out in. He said he would bring some fries out first so we could.start on that. We said "thank you so much!" Then when he brought it out, I even did a little dance saying "YAY! Thank u soooooo much!" Well I guess he thought that meant he didn't have to tend to us anymore, and that we were happy.  Because after that we literally did not see him for another 45 minutes or more!!!! It was around 9 pm by then and we entered the restaurant before 8pm!  Another server came by and helped us because she saw that we were waiting so long and not being taken care of!  We were grateful to her so we tipped her instead!  We also let Kathy know everything that happened and she did handle the whole situation professionally apologizing to us and letting us know that it was unacceptable and that she would have a talk with him.  I was in shock with all of the comments he made! I can't believe I didn't go off on him of how rude he was and how wrong he was for treating us in a threatening manner! He even said "when I brought your fries out first, I went from being the best server in the world to the worst server in the world in 2 seconds." What?!!  We were confused at that comment until we realized that he said that because of my positive ways in the beginning saying "yay, thank you so much" and 'dancing'.... This just proved that he felt that we didn't need anymore attention and that he could focus on his other customers! He felt that in his eyes we were good. Off of just 1 basket of fries???  He didn't even give us silverware ir napkins when the  fries came out, and said they weren't clean! So we didnt get our silverware until we asked the other server. My son needed water and asked, he said ok, then we didn't see him for over 45 minutes!  Then when he passed by and said some other comments that just were unacceptable that is when we finally decided to call the manager Kathy. Thank you again, Kathy for taking care of us! The 2nd burger YOU brought out was good, and like we told you, we hope that people at corporate realize what a gem they have in YOU! You handled this whole HORRIFIC situation (where my son didn't even eat until way past 9 and mind you, separate from when we ate) better with your kind and professional manner. We thank you again! Kathy gets 10/10 However I will NEVER go to this red robin! Because I was dealing with Kathy our waiter was mad dogging us the whole time and Kathy decided she better walk us out. Insane!

I've been here a few times always great servers and service the environment is good. I truly appreciate getting great service makes you want to keep coming back and on the servers bright side a good tip.
Thanks for helping my party out after WOOD REACH had us wait 2 hours, and you guys got us in 30 min and had fries for us ready to go!! Food and drinks AMAZING. Great service.

My co-worker ordered tortilla soup. She got soup that was all beans. The server looked at it three times, yet did not ask her if anything was wrong with her order? This place has gone DOWNHILL & is absolutely not worth my time or $$ !! I'll go get my hamburgers at Daglas down the street. Much better value.

best burgers i ever had!!! their ingredients are always fresh, their customer service is awesome! and the ranch dressing is to die for!!! my personal favorites are whiskey river bbq, peppercorn burger and prime chophouse! to be honest i've tried the glendale location as well; the one in galleria but the burger didn't taste as good, and the waiters were slow.

Yuck!!! I was hoping that when the restaurant moved to the out door location it would taste better- but no such luck!!! I ordered the chicken sandwich and only ate chewy pieces that I kept spitting out- the all you can eat fries is also a joke- we got 5 fries every time-- and to top it off- the waiter was rude, slow, and just unpleasant. I would not recommend this place at all. 2 stars is generous!!

We have had nothing but poor experiences since they moved locations, but this last time will be my last time. The service here is AWFUL. My husband and I were sat and we were waiting for the rest of our party. We sat at the table for 10 minutes before we were ever approached by our "server". It took them 40 minutes to bring our appetizer, and then followed with our food a few minutes later. Our food was cold and not to order. I told the girl who delivered our food we wanted to order a shake. She rudely told us we do that our selves from the table, which I then did. We were all finished with our food and still no shake. I asked our "server" and he went to check. Brought us out a shake but not the one we ordered. When we told him he left to fix it. 20 minutes later he brings us out the shake, which at this point we didn't even want anymore. We had to ask for refills on our drinks which we finally got after our food was gone. We had to ask for refills on our fries which also came long after we were done eating. The manager came out to apologize and say he wasn't going to charge us for the shake. The shake was going to be free anyways as part of their "rewards" plan. Terrible experience. $100 on food that was cold and awful. Non existent service. Our table was still covered with dirty plates of half eaten food since our server never cleared anything. Just done with this place. I sent an email complaining and just got a form letter back saying sorry. They obviously don't care about my business so they won't be receiving it any longer.

We love this Red Robin joint! Friendly service and great food, but today in particular stood out the most. We called ahead to ask if we would be allowed to bring our corgi dog on a leash to their enclosed patio, we were told it would be fine. We were sat almost immediately and the manager Ryan came out to great us with our waitress Gabby, I think we got some extra love today because our dog is so cute! They were so kind and brought Beeker out her own bowl of water and basket of French fries! Hands down best day of her life, haha, but it was up there with one of our best restaurant experiences too. Thanks to Red Robin for a great dining experience for us and our dog! :)
Devin is a BOSS! Runs the bar with ease during the rush and took great care of us. Great A1 burger and garlic fries with a Stella  will be back!

Let's be clear. I make great chili. I'm kind of an expert. But this is seriously the best chili I have had. Can't stop talking and thinking about it. I tried it at different locations and it was good but not great. Go to this place!

I first called and was greeted by Christina, her warm, and friendly laugh made me already feel welcome. I called to ask if they would take reservations, which they didn't but she assured me I'd be okay in my time frame. I came and then surely changed my mind. Note that it was Super Bowl, I was with three of my friends and ordered what I thought sounded like a great burger. The waiter I believe CJ is his name was more into the game then he was with me and my friends. I immediately called a manager, and explained that he got two of our orders wrong and seemed to be more into the game than into working. They made my burger completely wrong, sent it back and as a joke put 7 fries and only 7 in my basket. It's unlimited fries which is great, but the chef thought they would teach me a lesson by fixing the burger and giving me 7 fries, is that a joke? The manager comped my meals as well as my friends, and gave me a $20 gift card. I will not go back.

First of all, I have to give it up for Emy for the marvelous service she provided. Her  upbeat personality, attentiveness and all around amazingness really set the tone for a great night . She made us feel very welcomed which has been lacking in many restaurants we've been to. Thank you Emy for all you did. Secondly, the food in my opinion tastes better than I remember! I don't know if the recipes changed but kudos to this location and Red Robin in general.  Overall, this night was a great night out with my wife, sister and her boyfriend.  Thank you Emy, we will be coming back mainly because of you.

we went there today only had to wait 10 minutes to be seated they were very busy still got food at a timely manner the food was very good the waitress and servers were  very nice  and very professional in fulfilling our needs

I'm sad to give this Red Robin's such a low review because Red Robin is my boyfriend's favorite place to get a burger. He even insists on having this as his birthday meal! Unfortunately, last night we were truly disappointed with the quality of their food. We ordered the boneless BBQ chicken wings for an appetizer, his regular burger & fries, and I had a bowl of the chicken tortilla soup. We were surprised that our entrees came out well before our wings did. The moment we looked at the wings, we could tell that they were barely dipped in BBQ sauce. They were extremely cold and hard and the kettle potato chips tasted like a stale bag of chips you'd buy at the gas station.  Our waiter was apologetic and took the wings off of our bill. I don't think that we will be returning to this location.

Austin our server was fabulous! We've have not been to Red Robin since the restaurant moved next door to Wood Ranch restaurant. We found the old restaurant dated and uncleaned. We loved the new restaurant decor and fast service during a very busy lunch hour as we arrived at 12:30 p.m. it was crowded, but the drinks and food was deliver to our table quickly. Burgers, fries and drinks were very good and tasty! We wished we could have asked for water instead of a fresh strawberry/lemonade drink price around $4.50 each this is too much to pay for one beverage, we will ask for water in our next visit LOL! The price of our drinks did not take at all from the great service "Austin" our server provided to us "First Class Service." We'll be returning soon for some great yummy burgers and all we care to eat french fries.

I don't understand why I come back.  food is good but service here is the worst. I got seated and waited 15 min before someone who was not our waiter took our drink order. then I waited another 10 to order food.  when I got the drinks 1 was 3/4 full which is not a big deal but...  anyway service is what sucks here.  I will never come back to this one again.

I have been here a few times, and its not bad.... until today!! Went to "linner" (between lunch and dinner) to have some burgers and such, and although it was busy, we were able to find a seat at the bar fairly quickly. It still had dishes, so i just had someone clean it up real quick. My friends and I had been working out, so the boys wanted something light but filling. My friend ordered the salmon that was supposed to come with veggies and some slaw.. but what it came with was a mess!!! It was the most unappealing and unappetizing plate I had ever seen!  Anyway, we arent ones to complain, but i had to ask if the waiter himself would eat it. Bill came, and I just couldn't stand to see 14.99 on the bill for that plate! Had it removed. Thankfully the manager was attentive and respectful. Anyway, point is... dont order the salmon!

Been here multiple times. Once a bug was in my friend's water. The manager came and apologized, and begrudgingly took my friend's meal off the bill. He looked like he wanted to punch me in the face, though, like I was trying to scam him for free food.  Another time, and now this might be my fault, I was on a diet, so I ordered some low calorie chicken dish, and wow, it was atrocious. Really awful. The waiter asked me how it was, and I told him, and he did nothing. I probably should have just had a burger, or something, but they shouldn't put things on the menu if they're going to be that bad.
Went to have dinner with my husband, food was ok 0 customer service. Not coming to this location anymore.

Was looking forward to my to-go. Waiter was so distracted talking about his weekend with his co-worker, left out the goodies I had requested. He didn't even bother checking the order before handing us the wrong one. Bumber.

Horrible dining experience! Asshole manager and dishonest employee. Never gonna come back to this place. To begin with red robin has a difficult "loyalty" program. I used their 15%off in the email they sent me. I showed it to the waitress at the start of our order. Trazy was great. Nothing against her. We were suppose to celebrate my fathers bday which turned into an ugly disaster caused by a lying fake assistant manager Athea and even worst manager Tony. Athea claimed we cursed at her which in all honesty we never did. I told her to call the manager and manager without doing proper investigation on what happened came and told just told us to "Dont come back here!" Very rude! In my mind he didn't have to tell us since we had a bad experience already. Poor service and discourteous staff.  Our family was furious with this disrespectful experience but as always we took the higher ground and stayed classy. We never answered back.   I would never ever recommend you guys to eat at this place. You'll just become an unhappy camper and make your day worst.

I don't typically review chain restaurants because one rarely ever differs from the rest, but I felt inclined to review this Red Robin location because I was dismayed to find reviews on here that don't reflect the caliber and quality of the staff at this location.  I work in Northridge and favor this restaurant over the others in the area. For one, I really like that they section areas off by population. The bar and surrounding areas are only for adults 21+, whereas the seating area to the left of the hostess stand and patio nearest the parking lot are for families. That's awesome, in my opinion because no one really wants to be around children unless you really have to be. Amirite?? I digress. Secondly, the staff here is super friendly and consistent. If you feel like chatting it up, the bartenders are happy to oblige, but if you're there to simply wash away the day's nasty aftertaste they are fine with simply refilling your glass and fry basket. Speaking of the staff-Jacklynn, Conny and Alex are some of the best people to be served by. They give you legit recommendations for food and any new beers on tap.  Lastly, although I rarely come here with more than one person, they are happy to accommodate larger parties with a little notice. Even though they don't take reservations, we called ahead for a party of 20 once and by the time we got to the restaurant they were ready for us and we had no wait.  Overall, don't be deterred by the sour Sallies who complain about trying to use expired 15% off coupons on here. Give them a try and you won't be disappointed.

I had a party of 12 (all adults & 1 child) & half of us got our order correct, the rest of us had something missing or got our order wrong, forgot our servers name, but she was African American- tall, really pretty BUT HER SERVER SKILLS NEED IMPROVEMENT, i was already done eating my food when I had to remind her about my drink. She never offered me a child's menu for my son, & she never came by to check up on us. I had to ask another server for missing items such as fries & condiments. As a former employee for a famously known restaurant I know the how's & the where abouts on how a restaurant works, so I didn't bother making a scene with her, I spoke to the manager at the time & she apologized, but didn't offer to comp any of our orders for being incorrect. It also bothered me that they don't offer MILITARY discounts. My brother a USMC who came to visit us from Camp Pendleton for that weekend joined us & it was a shame that they couldn't offer us some type of discount. I was very displeased in the service but more disappointed in the manager for not touching tables & doing what a manager is suppose to do. I will not be returning to this specific location.

This is one of the family's go-to places when we're at (or near) the mall. The food is always great, there is rarely a long wait, and service is always excellent. As a matter of fact, tonight I had 3 employees ask if I wanted a refill on my drink in the 2 minutes it took for the first to come back with it!

Haven't been to a Red Robin in years!! The service was great! Had an adorable server named Aaren today and she was smiley, friendly, attentive and did an amazing job handling all of her tables! The Clucks & Fries i ordered weren't as good as I remembered. The chicken was overcooked and so were the fries. They must have changed their fries too because years ago they were big steak fries and was the reason I liked this place! It was disappointing but I'll survive. This is connected to the Northridge mall so lots of parking available and the wait wasn't long which was nice.

Unpleased with the service, well mostly the host. My family and I came in to have dinner. We signed up and didnt get called, all these other families who came after us were called before us. I got mad and went up the host and asked wth was going on, all she said.."oh yes we have you, come right this way" like playing it out she messed up. Never got a"Sorry" just a "Your server will be right with you". Then our server never came, I had to pressed the button for the server to come... Bad service. BUT FOOD ALWAYS GOOD..

Wanted to give the Northridge location a try. Went with my son for lunch. We waited about 20 minutes for a seat. Maybe they were short staffed because there were plenty of open tables, so not sure why the wait was so long.  I ordered the Boca burger , Smokey Jack Tavern style, bottomless fries and a Pomegranate tea. It was tasty and the fries were good, seasoning was good also. Just had no distinctive flavors, as expected pre the menu description. Tea was good too. He had the Burnin Love and a Caramel Milkshake. The Milk shake was the best part for him. He wasn't thrilled with the burger.  Kind of disappointing for the price. Wasn't as flavorful as he was expecting, per the menu description. Service was good Ruby was our waitress, she was very friendly and attentive. Parking is plentiful also. Overall, I think they are a bit pricy for the quality of food. I won't make a special trip back and not sure if I would even come back if in the area, just not that impressed.

Went for a late lunch.  Server was very inattentive and seemed like she forgot about us.  Food was ok.  Service was not good.   Don't think we will go back.  Too many other options with good service.   Other servers seemed to be much better.  We waited for someone to take drink order, waited for drinks, and food took a really long time.  Then waited a while for boxes and our receipt.

Service was slow but good Food was excellent as usual (kinda expected im a long time premier card holder) but price they failed  18 dollars to split a black and blue hamburger outrageous very upset about that

Came in to grab a quick burger and a beer at the bar and I can tell Javier the bartender was busy (he had the bar and the cocktail area) he still managed to make small talk with guest, get my order right,and ask how everything was...good job man keep up the good work

Red Robin definitely has the best burgers in town. One of the best burgers here are the Marco polo black pepper burger. The California burger is also very good. The spaghetti is also really good here I had it a couple times. The fish and chips is definitely the best in town compared to all these major named businesses that sells seafood. Red Robin is very affordable for a sitdown dining restaurant. Prices are very very fair and they environment is very family oriented.

We will stay far away from this place! Bartender as nice and sweet as she can be!! Food "EEK" Ordered 1/2 order wings, had the same last week now no more 1/2 order checked other locations still available. Ordered martini no onions, ok olives just fine, no tooth pick, had to give me a spoon, What is that about? Wife ordered Skye vodka w/lime, nothing but flavored Skye, had to settle still ok, but a totally bad experience all in all. Just F.Y.I.

3.5 stars not quite 4 rounding down to properly designate the worthiness of your dollars... Stopped in on a Saturday... it was busy but seated within 5 mins... Ordering was quick but it felt like a long wait to get our food... Ryan the manager fixed my reward account to accept my free birthday burger - thank you, excellent customer service! Salad was just ok... Burger was tasty not great not average, solid! Fries just a notch above ok but they are bottomless... Milk shake was good, I heard the salmon was good... Tasty birthday Sunday for dessert... no singing ha! Not a complaint per se just an observation - service isn't bad but you get the sense that it's just a job. Yes of course it is, but I got the service I expected for the price I paid nothing more... Had we went to Catch or some $$$$$ establishment I would have expected that elevated level of service. Ryan was a notch above the rest and was a great representation of this place so kudos to you. I'm returning because of him. Thanks again!

The food is terrific customer service is always excellent. Definitely a good friendly environment to be in and eat that. You guys should definitely go out this restaurant if you haven't tried red Robin gourmet burgers yet.

One of the worst burgers I've had. I expected a nice juicy burger this was a flat dried out patty that I would get at mcdonalds. Save your money. The manager was gracious and did not charge me.  if I want an inferior burger I will get  quater punder at Macdonalds.

By far one of the worst services I have ever received. Never have I seen such favoritism amongst waiters and customers. Our waitress was not checking up on us at all. She passed by us twice while we were calling her. She favored the couple next to us who got there after we did. I used to love Red Robin. Yeah, not anymore.
Great Red Robin location!!! Wonderful staff, especially in the bar area. Always a long wait for the dining room. I recommend it.

Amazing service. We came in late with a large party and they were extremely accommodating. The manager, Brian was very nice as well as our server Connor. The food was delicious and cooked to perfection! Definitely coming back to this location!!
Will never go again, Terrible service not worth the aggravation for a decent burger.
Shawn was our server. He was amazing. Ryan the manager came over. He was so friendly and of course he was from NY.  Great service. Great burgers!

Unfortunately I do not have any pictures to share for our visit. We went on Fathers Day to Red Robin and had amazing customer service. I cannot remember our waitress name but we were sitting on the patio. My brother and his girlfriend are Vegan and had questions about the menu. Our waitress went above and beyond to do her research as to what was Vegan and what was non-Vegan. The manager even came outside to make sure all questions were answered appropriately. The food was amazing like always. We had a great experience and time. The place was getting full and our waitress would not forget about us. Will definitely go back to this location.

Man the last time I went to Red Robin must of been at least 8 years ago. I do not remember it being this bad. The service is awesome I had a great! Service left her like a 25% tip lol But the burger, omg nooo  It was awful I forced myself to eat 1/2 and basically all the fries. Now the bottomless fry thing is an awesome concept.  I ordered the blue ribbon burger and unfortunately it was awful.  Well I wanted to try it and I did, but I think I'll pass next time
We enjoy this place - come to the bar so it's child-free! Food is good! Love the staff!

Eh. The "new" Red Robin is fine, a little more modern and simple, no more of the "messiness" decor like it was in the 90s. I kinda miss it. Anyway, I feel like I'm being very generous with the rating, but there's no way to give 1/2 votes. I would give RR 2 1/2 stars. The place is always busy, the service sucks, which is weird bc when it was the old, smaller RR, service was much better. This new facelift seems to have happened at the expense of quality customer service. Don't get me wrong, the servers are nice, but it's just s l o w. I hate having to repeat my request for refills and napkins and ranch. I also hate to sound demanding, asking for all those at once. But you have to, bc you aren't sure if the servers will make their way back to you in a timely manner. I suppose the 1/2 star to make it 3 goes to the niceness of the staff. They just need to work on their timeliness.

Terrible location. If you want a bad experience with horrible customer service skills go here. I asked one of there bar tenders for utensils, napkins, & ketchup. His response to me as he threw all these things on the counter was "I'm not your waiter ask him if you need anything". My waiter was obviously untraceable. His name is DAVE.

Red Robin is amazing! I usually share a tavern double burger with my daughter who eats like a bird (lol) and we share the bottomless steak fries with garlic and cheese. The service is great. They asked us if we wanted a refill on the garlic fries before we were even done with our fries! The side sauces are awesome too! Must try the spicy ketchup with garlic fries and fry seasoning!   we got a large strawberry lemonade tavern double burger and bottomless garlic fries for $15! Can't go wrong with that! This location has a really friendly staff. I ate here twice and enjoyed the bar and table experience. Ps steak fries are unlimited and to die for

The guacamole burger I had at jack in the box was honestly better.  All their burgers come with bottomless fries which is cool, except the taste is a huge miss for me. They taste like pre-frozen, packaged fries and get cold really fast. I had to dip them in tons of aioli sauce for them to be edible. The service however is pretty good here, I would say way better than the food itself. Our waiter was friendly and he came by to check on us several times. Overall I don't think I'd come here again. The food is just not appetizing.

I always go to this restaurant food is good. Service is aslo good. Nice and clean place....
I love the burgers at this place, it's not only that but the service it's pretty fast, I hate waiting lol.. anyways it's a plus ...

Amazing food thank you for the best service possible. I loved all the food on the menu. You guys are the best thank uou

Amazing experience. The manager treated us so well taking us out of the line ( long wait ) so that we could order the veterans special on Veterans Day. Really awesome supervisor to do that and amazing service tonight!

Service is awesome food is amazing. Never disappointed with the food or service . The manager Ryan is hands down the best manager we have ever come across. Milkshakes are delicious desserts are out of this world. Best burger selection. Chicken and Salmon sandwiches are to die for. Prices are very reasonable for what you get. Love love love this place.
This food was really good. Thank you for the amazing service. I will be back asap with my friends
